item.title: Overhanging branches and bushes blocking footpath, 19th June
item.description:
The footpath has been severely narrowed from overhanging bushes etc making it difficult to walk on. You are unable to walk down and pass another user without going in the road, this is dangerous as most of this stretch is a corner and you are unable to see traffic coming. This is also used daily by the local SEN school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crockenhill Road, St Mary Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
